page.title: 05Football and Netball in Dav.
page.content: Daventry has it's own Netball league, at the time of the survey it had 14 playing teams.The majority of the teams are Daventry based, although several come in from the outlying villages. There are no players from Daventry who regularly represent the county, the travelling to suitable training prevents this. There are several local Football leagues and Games are played Saturdays and Sundays. There is also a Wednesday evening floodlit league at the Grange Sports Centre. People who wish to play Hockey are disadvantaged through lack of facilities, men have to travel to Northampton (17 miles) and the nearest women's club is in Long Buckby some six miles away.
